## truncate() function

Truncate a string to the specified width.

Shortens text to fit within a maximum width. Use the `tail` option to add an indicator like "..." when content is truncated.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function truncate(s: string, width: number, options?: TruncateOptions): string;
```

_(Optional)_ Truncation options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The truncated string

## Example


```ts
truncate("Hello World", 8);
// "Hello Wo"

truncate("Hello World", 8, { tail: "..." });
// "Hello..."
```
